group_1.narration: We wandered into a tranquil Futatsugi,@free from the history of the Bloody Tragedy,@where Magical Girls worked hand-in-hand@through thick and thin.
Perhaps one of the girls who died@brought us into this world...
Thoroughly unsettled, we speculated that the spirits@of the deceased wanted revenge against us.

group_1.textRight: If vengeance is what they're after, why don't@they just curse us to death or somethin'?

group_1.textLeft: As Miura stated, physical attacks may@not be possible...

group_1.textRight: That means they'd have to bank on@mental attacks, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: Are they trying to exhaust our magic by@trapping us in an idyllic world?

group_1.textRight: For fuck's sake, they're makin' us take@the long way around.
...Hey, Sis, why don't we just go for it?
If they can't touch us, let's give 'em the@opportunity to fight.

group_1.textLeft: You mean by attacking each other, they'll be@spurred to lash out as well?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I was thinkin' that maybe since we were@open to talkin' it out,
those chicks couldn't get the payback@they wanted.

group_1.textLeft: If your hunch is correct, we may as well@give it a try.

group_1.textRight: So we'll accept their revenge?

group_1.textLeft: However, if they come at us with murderous intent,@we must do everything in our power to resist.
Though I know I am guilty as charged, I cannot die@while I have the future to attend to.
It would be best if we could allow them to@vent their feelings and then escape.

group_1.textRight: To reach our contradictin' goals of lettin' them@get revenge without killin' us,
are we gonna stage things so they can fight@their feelings out?

group_1.textLeft: I think it would be easier for them to do so@if Futatsugi was as brutal as it used to be...

group_1.textRight: They'll come out swingin' with intent to kill,@but we'll tough it out so we don't die.
And then... Once they've cleared their heads,@we can get the hell outta dodge.

group_1.textLeft: Mind you, since our opponents are already dead,@I'm not sure that this will work...

group_1.textRight: With Juri the Great's brawn and your brains,@we got this down pat.
Might end up dyin' anyway, though.@We'll see how it shakes out.
Don't pack it in before I do, Sis.

group_1.textLeft: ...Likewise, Juri.

group_1.textRight: ...So, we gettin' started tonight?

group_1.textLeft: Indeed... The bloody wars we fought time@and again...
Tonight...we shall repeat those unforgivable sins.

group_1.textRight: Now then, about the rules and such@going forward...

group_1.textLeft: There ain't none.

group_1.textRight: What? But I mean...the disputes over territory...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah? Get ready to settle them with your fists.

group_1.textRight: Juri?!@What the heck are you talking about...?!

group_1.textLeft: The hell do you think?@What I'm sayin' is real simple.
Whoever's strongest beats the Witch and@claims the Grief Seed.
There, all problems solved.[chara:102400:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102400:cheek_0][chara:102400:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:102400:lipSynch_1] Heehee.

group_1.textRight: ...That means the weak girls will get@stomped out...!

group_1.textLeft: Well, it's their own fault for sucking.
But hey, if ya join Ryuugasaki,@I can help you out a little.
Once you're under my wing,@you'll be a lackey for life.

group_1.textRight: Grr...
Yuna... Are you alright with this?

group_1.textLeft: Indeed... My negotiations with Juri broke down...
Which is why I must resort to force to@get her to submit...

group_1.textRight: Force...? You must be joking!

group_1.textLeft: This is war...

group_1.textRight: Been a while, hasn't it? Let's get it on...Sis!
You can't just...!

group_1.textLeft: If you take issue with this, do feel free@to challenge us to a fight.
We'll always be waiting for you...
...Now, Juri, let us begin.

group_1.textRight: Hell yeah...!
